column2: "Hey partner, how are you doing? Meeting here must have been fate. Hehe."
"This area is like a maze, I really can't figure out which way I came from."
"I saw some of those little shadow guys around."
"I ran into them and they ran away in the blink of an eye."
"I wonder why, it's not like we're doing anything to them."
"They seem to really know everything about this place. Maybe they can tell by landmarks or something?"
"Well since it's not like we can talk to them, I'll just have to figure out how to get out of here myself."
